articles.title: Cottage cheese and sour cream are safe amid bird flu outbreak, FDA says - NBC News
articles.description: Is dairy safe to eat? New FDA tests find that pasteurization is effective against the bird flu virus for milk, cottage cheese and sour cream. The virus has spread to 36 dairy herds in nine states.
